titleStmt.title: The horrid conspiragie [sic] of such impenitent traytors as intended a new rebellion in the kingdom of Ireland with a list of the prisoners, and the particular manner of seizing Dublin-castle by Ludlow, and his accomplices : verbatim out of the expresses sent to His Majesty from the Duke of Ormond.
titleStmt.author: Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.
Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)

notesStmt.note: Ludlow was not involved in the attack.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
